traits.Charge: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.Multiattack: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.
actions.Pike: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Hooves: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
